text: The 2017 season for the cycling team began in January with the Tour Down Under. As a UCI WorldTeam, they were automatically invited and obligated to send a squad to every event in the UCI World Tour. ==Team roster== ;Riders who joined the team for the 2017 season {| class="wikitable" |- !Rider !2016 team |- |Pello Bilbao|| |- |Zhandos Bizhigitov||neo-pro () |- |Matti Breschel|| |- |Sergey Chernetskiy|| |- |Oscar Gatto|| |- |Jesper Hansen|| |- |Truls Engen Korsæth||neo-pro |- |Riccardo Minali||neo-pro Team Colpack |- |Moreno Moser|| |- |Nikita Stalnov||neo-pro |- |Michael Valgren|| |} ;Riders who left the team during or after the 2016 season {| class="wikitable" |- !Rider !2017 team |- |Valerio Agnoli|| |- |Maxat Ayazbayev|| |- |Lars Boom|| |- |Eros Capecchi|| |- |Andrea Guardini|| |- |Davide Malacarne|| |- |Vincenzo Nibali|| |- |Diego Rosa|| |- |Gatis Smukulis|| |- |Lieuwe Westra|| |} ==Season victories== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
